column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Amazing. No matter how many times you've been here
column2: you feel like you haven't seen everything. There's a great range of art mediums and movements
column3: and even if you're not especially familiar with art history
column4: you'll be able to see plenty of famous things you'll recognize. My only complaints would be that occasionally the place gets a bit too busy with tourists
column5: that it closes a lot earlier than I would like and that a few of the visiting exhibits have been lackluster. But overall
column6: it's one of my favorite museums and a must-see if you're a visitor to Chicago.
